faqs.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faqs.answer: Check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 11:00 AM.

faqs.question: Do you have Wi-Fi?
faqs.answer: Yes, complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

faqs.question: Is breakfast included?
faqs.answer: Breakfast is included with most room rates. Please check your booking details.

faqs.question: Do you have a swimming pool?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have an indoor swimming pool open from 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM.

room_types.name: Standard Room
room_types.description: Comfortable room with a queen-size bed.

room_types.name: Deluxe Room
room_types.description: Spacious room with a king-size bed and city view.

room_types.name: Suite
room_types.description: Luxurious suite with a separate living area and panoramic views.
